toolbar: QToolBar{ background: qlineargradient(x1: 0, y1: 0, x2: 0, y2: 1,stop: 0 #E7E7E7, stop: 1.0 #D0D0D0) ; border-bottom:1px solid #000000 ;border-top:1px solid #000000   }
toolbar2: QToolBar{ border-top:1px solid #000000; border-bottom:0px solid #000000; background:#d0d0d0; } QToolBar::separator{ margin-left: 3px;margin-right: 2px;background: qlineargradient(x1: 0, y1: 0, x2: 0, y2: 1,stop: 0 #B0B0B0,stop: 0.5 #999999,  stop: 1.0 #B0B0B0) }
toolbtn: QToolButton{ background: qlineargradient(x1: 0, y1: 0, x2: 0, y2: 1,stop: 0 #E7E7E7, stop: 1.0 #D0D0D0) ; margin-top:0px ; margin-bottom:0px ; border:0px soid; color:#ffffff ; border-right:0px solid #b0b0b0  } QToolButton:hover{ background: qlineargradient(x1: 0, y1: 0, x2: 0, y2: 1,stop: 0 #777777, stop: 1.0 #7F7F7F);  } QComboBox::drop-down{  border:0px ; }
menubar: QMenuBar::item{ background: qlineargradient(x1: 0, y1: 0, x2: 0, y2: 1,stop: 0 #E7E7E7, stop: 1.0 #D0D0D0)  } QMenuBar{ background: qlineargradient(x1: 0, y1: 0, x2: 0, y2: 1,stop: 0 #E7E7E7, stop: 1.0 #D0D0D0) } QMenuBar::item:selected{ background: qlineargradient(x1: 0, y1: 0, x2: 0, y2: 1,stop: 0 #777777, stop: 1.0 #7F7F7F) ; color:white  }
